header: Trust us to find your dream job.
We are the best place in the Netherlands for your career.
Together, we achieve your professional goals.
Neox is your partner for success in the job market.

BV.title: NEOX EAS B.V.
BV.content: Is the specialist in providing experienced professionals for various sectors, including:

solution.title: The Solution for Staff Shortages
content: The contemporary job market is characterized by a severe shortage of skilled professionals. This can hinder your business operations and negatively impact your productivity.
We offer the solution to this problem by providing additional personnel. Real craftsmen who will work with you long-term. This way, you are assured of well-trained and reliable staff once again.

content.text: We have an extensive database of professionals in various disciplines.
We understand that you need the right people quickly. Therefore, we strive to fill your vacancy within 24 hours.
All our professionals are screened and certified. This ensures you receive quality.
We value building long-term relationships with you. Therefore, we take the time to discuss your needs and requirements.

services.text: We search for and select the right professionals for your vacancy.
We provide flexible temporary workers for your temporary projects.
We second professionals for longer periods.

title: About Us
Excellence and Commitment in Every Service

content.text: Our mission is simple yet powerful: to provide high-quality, reliable services that make a real difference for our clients. Across our four specialized companies—cleaning, logistics, employing, and construction services—we are united by a commitment to exceeding expectations, ensuring timely delivery, and building lasting relationships.

At each step, we put our clients first, recognizing that your needs shape our work. Whether you require efficient logistics solutions, a dedicated cleaning team, reliable workforce support, or expert construction services, we have the experience and expertise to deliver outstanding results every time.

By choosing us, you’re choosing a partner dedicated to integrity, quality, and consistent performance. We’re not just here to provide a service; we’re here to support your goals, fulfill your vision, and bring peace of mind through our trustworthy service.
